languages.text: "Боюсь, пока вы не разберетесь с насущными проблемами, церемонию придется отложить. Многие торговые пути все еще недоступны, центральные миры протектората фон Валанциус переживают кризисы, а волнения в {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпе{/g}, насколько можно верить прозревающим пустоту, не позволят важным гостям добраться до столицы".

traits.locale_text: "Боюсь, пока вы не разберетесь с насущными проблемами, церемонию придется отложить. Многие торговые пути все еще недоступны, центральные миры империи фон Валанциус переживают кризисы, а волнения в варпе, насколько можно верить прозревающим пустоту, не позволят важным гостям добраться до столицы".

languages.text: "I'm afraid that, until you deal with pressing issues, the ceremony will have to be postponed. Many trade routes are still unavailable, the central worlds of the von Valancius protectorate are going through a crisis, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} disturbances, if void observers are to be believed, will prevent important guests from reaching the capital."
languages.original_text: "Боюсь, пока вы не разберетесь с насущными проблемами, церемонию придется отложить. Многие торговые пути все еще недоступны, центральные миры протектората фон Валанциус переживают кризисы, а волнения в {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпе{/g}, насколько можно верить прозревающим пустоту, не позволят важным гостям добраться до столицы".

traits.locale_text: "I'm afraid that, until you deal with pressing issues, the ceremony will have to be postponed. Many trade routes are still unavailable, the central worlds of the von Valancius empire are going through a crisis, and the warp disturbances, if void observers are to be believed, will prevent important guests from reaching the capital."

"I'm afraid that, until you deal with pressing issues, the ceremony will have to be postponed. Many trade routes are still unavailable, the central worlds of the von Valancius empire are going through a crisis, and the warp disturbances, if void observers are to be believed, will prevent important guests from reaching the capital."

"I'm afraid that, until you deal with pressing issues, the ceremony will have to be postponed. Many trade routes are still unavailable, the central worlds of the von Valancius empire are going through a crisis, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} disturbances, if void observers are to be believed, will prevent important guests from reaching the capital."

"I'm afraid that, until you deal with pressing issues, the ceremony will have to be postponed. Many trade routes are still unavailable, the central worlds of the von Valancius empire are going through a crisis, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} disturbances, if void observers are to be believed, will prevent important guests from reaching the capital."

"I'm afraid that, until you deal with pressing issues, the ceremony will have to be postponed. Many trade routes are still unavailable, the central worlds of the von Valancius protectorate are going through a crisis, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} disturbances, if void observers are to be believed, will prevent important guests from reaching the capital."

languages.text: “典礼恐怕得推迟了，您得先解决迫在眉睫的问题才行。许多贸易路线仍然没有恢复，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的诸多核心世界正在经历危机。而且，如果虚空观测者说得没错，由于{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}的干扰，那些重要的客人根本无法来到首都世界。”
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid that, until you deal with pressing issues, the ceremony will have to be postponed. Many trade routes are still unavailable, the central worlds of the von Valancius protectorate are going through a crisis, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} disturbances, if void observers are to be believed, will prevent important guests from reaching the capital."

traits.locale_text: “典礼恐怕得推迟了，您得先解决迫在眉睫的问题才行。许多贸易路线仍然没有恢复，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的诸多核心世界正在经历危机。而且，如果虚空观测者说得没错，由于{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}的干扰，那些重要的客人根本无法来到首都世界。”

languages.text: «Me temo que hasta que resuelva los problemas más acuciantes será necesario posponer la ceremonia. Hay muchas rutas comerciales inaccesibles, los mundos centrales del protectorado von Valancius están en crisis y, si los observadores del vacío están en lo cierto, las perturbaciones de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} evitarán que invitados distinguidos lleguen a la capital».
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid that, until you deal with pressing issues, the ceremony will have to be postponed. Many trade routes are still unavailable, the central worlds of the von Valancius protectorate are going through a crisis, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} disturbances, if void observers are to be believed, will prevent important guests from reaching the capital."

traits.locale_text: «Me temo que hasta que resuelva los problemas más acuciantes será necesario posponer la ceremonia. Hay muchas rutas comerciales inaccesibles, los mundos centrales del protectorado von Valancius están en crisis y, si los observadores del vacío están en lo cierto, las perturbaciones de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} evitarán que invitados distinguidos lleguen a la capital».

languages.text: 「残念ながら、緊急の問題に対処していただくまでは式典を延期せざるを得ないでしょう。多くの交易路はいまだに使用できず、フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領の中心世界は危機的状況にあり、ヴォイドを目撃した者たちの言うことが真実ならば{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}の影響で重要な来賓客が首都に到着するのも困難な状態です」
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid that, until you deal with pressing issues, the ceremony will have to be postponed. Many trade routes are still unavailable, the central worlds of the von Valancius protectorate are going through a crisis, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} disturbances, if void observers are to be believed, will prevent important guests from reaching the capital."

traits.locale_text: 「残念ながら、緊急の問題に対処していただくまでは式典を延期せざるを得ないでしょう。多くの交易路はいまだに使用できず、フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領の中心世界は危機的状況にあり、ヴォイドを目撃した者たちの言うことが真実ならば{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}の影響で重要な来賓客が首都に到着するのも困難な状態です」

languages.text: "Ich fürchte, Ihr müsst die Zeremonie verschieben, bis einige dringliche Probleme gelöst sind. Viele Handelsrouten sind nach wie vor nicht verfügbar, die zentralen Welten des Protektorats von Valancius befinden sich in einer Krise, und die {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}-Störungen, wenn man den Beobachtern der Leere Glauben schenken darf, hindern wichtige Gäste daran, die Hauptstadt zu erreichen."
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid that, until you deal with pressing issues, the ceremony will have to be postponed. Many trade routes are still unavailable, the central worlds of the von Valancius protectorate are going through a crisis, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} disturbances, if void observers are to be believed, will prevent important guests from reaching the capital."

traits.locale_text: "Ich fürchte, Ihr müsst die Zeremonie verschieben, bis einige dringliche Probleme gelöst sind. Viele Handelsrouten sind nach wie vor nicht verfügbar, die zentralen Welten des Protektorats von Valancius befinden sich in einer Krise, und die {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}-Störungen, wenn man den Beobachtern der Leere Glauben schenken darf, hindern wichtige Gäste daran, die Hauptstadt zu erreichen."

languages.text: « Je crains qu'il ne nous faille reporter la cérémonie jusqu'à ce que les problèmes les plus urgents soient traités. Des nombreuses routes commerciales sont toujours impraticables, les mondes centraux du protectorat von Valancius font face à une crise sans précédent et, si l'on en croit les observateurs du vide, les perturbations du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} empêcheront de toute façon des invités importants d'atteindre la capitale. »
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid that, until you deal with pressing issues, the ceremony will have to be postponed. Many trade routes are still unavailable, the central worlds of the von Valancius protectorate are going through a crisis, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} disturbances, if void observers are to be believed, will prevent important guests from reaching the capital."

traits.locale_text: « Je crains qu'il ne nous faille reporter la cérémonie jusqu'à ce que les problèmes les plus urgents soient traités. Des nombreuses routes commerciales sont toujours impraticables, les mondes centraux du protectorat von Valancius font face à une crise sans précédent et, si l'on en croit les observateurs du vide, les perturbations du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} empêcheront de toute façon des invités importants d'atteindre la capitale. »

languages.text: "Korkarım ki öncelikle acil konularla ilgilenene kadar törenin ertelenmesi gerek. Birçok ticaret yolu hâlâ kapalı, von Valancius protektorasının merkez dünyaları krizde ve uçsuz gözlemcilerinin söyledikleri doğruysa {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g} bozunumları, önemli konukların başkente ulaşmasını engelleyecektir."
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid that, until you deal with pressing issues, the ceremony will have to be postponed. Many trade routes are still unavailable, the central worlds of the von Valancius protectorate are going through a crisis, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} disturbances, if void observers are to be believed, will prevent important guests from reaching the capital."

traits.locale_text: "Korkarım ki öncelikle acil konularla ilgilenmelisiniz, seremoninin ertelenmesi gerek. Birçok ticaret yolu hâlâ kapalı hâlde, von Valancius protektorasının merkez dünyaları bir kriz yaşıyorlar ve uçsuz gözlemcilerinin söyledikleri doğruysa {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g} bozunumları önemli konukların başkente ulaşmasını engelleyecektir."
